text: hello and welcome to bbc world news well
before we move to today's news let's go
back to that show in australia as more
than six tons of fireworks are sent into
sydney's skyline to ring in the new year
the city held two fireworks celebratory
displays the first one was let off at
9pm against the backdrop of the city's
famous opera house and then of course
there's this one the sydney harbour
bridge has been bathed in lights and
fireworks of course to recognize the
efforts of key workers during the
pandemic melbourne has also welcomed in
2022 with a fireworks show elsewhere
around the world new year's eve
celebrations have been scaled back
although there will be displays of some
kind in most places we'll bring them to
you at the top of each hour here on bbc
world news
[Music]
[Applause]
